name: Banish the Goblin Queen of 323
description:
There's intruders in the house, but not for long!

----

Wander through the house and figure out how to get those pesky goblins out. Also, you're a ghost.

Use ARROWS or WASD to move. SPACEBAR or movement to continue.

Made in Bitsy (V 7.2).

Directional Avatar, Transparent sprites, Permanent Items hacks by Sean and utilized via Borsky.

Submitted to the "goblins" bitsy jam, October 2020.
